button.pay.description: Text in button, used to pay for the order.

button.continuePay.description: Text in button, used to continue paying for the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Text in button, used to view order details.

button.query.description: Text in button, used to query the order.

button.finish.description: Text in button, used to manually complete the order.

button.update.description: Text in button, used to update the order.

field.amount.description: The point amount of the order.

field.price.description: The point amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method for the order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service, referring to an HTTP proxy used for data transmission.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to make a payment.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan to complete the payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment in the external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to paid status and complete the distribution process, which cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment, do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order is still waiting for user payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating that the payment for the order has failed.

title.info.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating Alipay payment, which is an online payment.

title.stripe.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating Stripe payment, which is an online payment.

title.manageOrder.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating order management.

title.x402.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating cryptocurrency payment (based on the X402 payment scheme).

message.discountTag.description: Text for the badge showing the applied discount percentage.

message.discountHint.message: As our exclusive VIP customer, you can automatically enjoy a {percent}% discount.
message.discountHint.description: Text explaining to the user that they automatically enjoy a discount due to VIP status.

message.x402DiscountApplied.message: Enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF with X402 payment.
message.x402DiscountApplied.description: Text explaining the additional discount brought by X402 payment.

message.x402DiscountTag.description: Highlighting the discount percentage that can be additionally enjoyed by choosing X402 payment.

message.x402DiscountHint.message: Select X402 payment to enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF discount immediately.
message.x402DiscountHint.description: A hint to inform users that they can unlock an additional discount by using X402 payment.

message.x402IntroShort.message: Complete USDC payment directly with your wallet.

message.x402TabWallet.description: Title for the Wallet Payment tab.

message.x402WalletTitle.description: Title for the X402 wallet quick payment (USDC).

message.x402WalletConnected.description: Label displayed when the wallet is connected.

message.x402ConnectWallet.description: Text for the button to connect the EVM wallet.

message.x402NoWalletDesc.message: Please use a browser that supports wallets (recommended Chrome/Brave), or install the MetaMask/Phantom extension; you can also open this page in the built-in browser of your mobile wallet app.
message.x402NoWalletDesc.description: General description for when no wallet is available.

message.x402SwitchNetwork.message: Please switch your wallet network to {network}
message.x402SwitchNetwork.description: Text prompting the user to switch to the specified chain network.

message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.message: Solana X402 backend is not yet enabled.
message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.description: Prompt when the order has not enabled Solana X402.

message.x402NeedConnectAccount.description: Reminder displayed when the wallet is not connected.

message.x402ConfirmTitle.description: Title for the X402 payment confirmation popup.

message.x402ConfirmDesc.description: Description for the X402 payment confirmation popup.

message.x402Step1.message: Connect your wallet (if not installed, please install the extension and refresh this page or open this page with your mobile wallet)

message.x402Step2.message: Modify wallet settings to confirm the wallet network is {network}

message.x402Step3.message: Click 'Use Wallet to Pay' and complete the authorization signature in your wallet

message.x402Step4.message: After successful signing, we will automatically settle, and this page will refresh to show that payment has been completed.

message.x402IntegrationResourceLabel.description: Label for the payment API address.

message.x402IntegrationPayToLabel.description: Label displaying the blockchain settlement address.

message.x402IntegrationNetworkLabel.description: Label displaying the blockchain network name.

message.x402IntegrationFallback.message: Failed to retrieve complete session data, please refer to the developer documentation or contact support for necessary parameters.
message.x402IntegrationFallback.description: Message displayed when session data cannot be retrieved.

message.x402IntegrationDocsCta.description: Text for the action button to open the developer guide.

message.x402InstallGuideTitle.description: Title for the wallet installation instructions popup.

message.x402InstallGuideDesc.message: Please follow the steps below to complete the installation of the {wallet} extension, then use the button below to refresh this page to re-detect the wallet.
message.x402InstallGuideDesc.description: Description guiding users to complete the wallet extension installation.

message.x402InstallGuideStep1.message: Open the newly opened page to download and install the {wallet} browser extension (recommended Chrome/Brave).

message.x402InstallGuideStep2.message: Complete the extension installation, log in/unlock, and confirm that it is enabled in the current browser profile.

message.x402InstallGuideStep3.message: Return to this page, click 'I have installed' and refresh before trying to 'Connect Wallet' again.

message.x402InstallGuideConfirm.description: Main button after completing wallet installation.

message.x402NetworkGuideTitle.description: Title for the network mismatch instructions popup.

message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.message: Please follow the steps below to switch your wallet network to {network}, and refresh this page to re-detect after completion.
message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.description: Description guiding users to adjust their wallet network.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep1.message: Open the wallet extension, go to Settings -> Active Networks.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.message: In the network list, confirm that {network} (or another specified network) is enabled. If it is enabled, you can ignore this step.
message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.description: Instructions for the second step of adjusting the network, no need to turn off Ethereum.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep3.message: Return to this page and click 'I have completed the setup' to refresh and try the payment again.

message.x402NetworkGuideConfirm.description: Main button after completing the network setup.

message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.message: The current wallet does not support automatic network switching. Please manually switch to the specified network in the wallet and try again.
message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.description: Prompt to inform the user that the wallet does not support automatic network switching and needs to switch manually.

message.x402PaymentFailed.message: X402 wallet payment failed, please try again later. If it fails multiple times, please contact support and provide the error information.
message.x402PaymentFailed.description: General error prompt that appears when X402 wallet payment fails.

message.x402WalletPayCta.description: Button text for completing payment using the bound wallet.

button.refund.description: Text in the button for manually refunding an order.

field.applicationId.description: The application ID associated with the order.

field.serviceId.description: The service ID corresponding to the discount.

field.generalDiscount.description: Label displayed when the discount applies to all services.

field.userId.description: The user ID that enjoys the discount.

field.discount.description: The discount rate applied to the user's order.

field.actions.description: Title for the action button column.

message.confirmRefund.message: This action will revoke the rights of this order and mark it as refunded, and cannot be undone. Please confirm that you have processed the refund, do you want to continue?

message.x402IntegrationIntro.message: The current order uses the X402 payment protocol. Please complete the integration on the server side based on the parameters below and initiate the payment.
message.x402IntegrationIntro.description: Introduction to the need to use the X402 protocol.

message.x402IntegrationProtocol.message: Call the facilitator payment interface and complete the signature broadcast. After successful settlement, return to this page to confirm the status.
message.x402IntegrationProtocol.description: Instructions for completing the X402 payment operation steps.

message.x402IntegrationDocsHint.message: Want to know more details? Please check the development documentation below.
message.x402IntegrationDocsHint.description: Text reminding users that they can get more information through the development documentation.

message.x402WalletTitleEvm.description: Title for the EVM wallet connection card.

message.x402WalletTitleSolana.description: Title for the Solana wallet connection card.

message.x402WalletStatusQr.description: Label for the WalletConnect QR code entry.

message.x402WalletConnectTitle.description: Title for the WalletConnect QR code popup.

message.x402WalletConnectPreparing.description: Prompt when preparing the WalletConnect connection.

message.x402WalletConnectOpenWallet.description: Button text to invoke the wallet via WalletConnect on mobile.

message.x402WalletConnectScanHint.message: Please use a wallet that supports WalletConnect to scan the QR code.
message.x402WalletConnectScanHint.description: Prompt text below the WalletConnect QR code.

message.x402SwitchNetworkCta.description: CTA for clicking to switch networks.

message.x402NoWalletTitle.description: Title when no EVM wallet is injected in the browser.

message.x402NoWalletSafariDesc.message: Safari usually does not support extensions like MetaMask. It is recommended to use Chrome/Brave or open this page in the built-in browser of the mobile wallet app.
message.x402NoWalletSafariDesc.description: Description for no wallet in Safari environment.

message.x402ConnectWC.description: Button text for connecting with WalletConnect.

message.x402RefreshDetect.description: Button text for re-detecting the wallet.

message.x402MissingWCProjectId.message: WalletConnect Project ID not configured (please set the environment variable VITE_WALLETCONNECT_PROJECT_ID)
message.x402MissingWCProjectId.description: Prompt for missing WalletConnect project ID.

message.x402WalletBound.description: Badge displayed when the wallet is bound.

message.userIdRequired.description: Prompt message displayed when the user ID is empty.

message.serviceIdRequired.description: Prompt message displayed when the service ID is empty.

message.discountRequired.message: Please enter a discount between 0 and 1.
message.discountRequired.description: Prompt message displayed when the discount is not within the valid range.

message.discountCreated.description: Prompt message displayed when a new discount is successfully created.

message.discountUpdated.description: Prompt message displayed when a discount is successfully edited.

message.discountDeleted.description: Prompt message displayed when a discount is successfully deleted.

state.refunded.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has been refunded.

title.revenueAnalysis.description: Title of the revenue analysis page.

title.last7dRevenue.message: Transaction Amount in the Last Week
title.last7dRevenue.description: Transaction amount in the last week.

title.last30dRevenue.message: Transaction Amount in the Last Month
title.last30dRevenue.description: Transaction amount in the last 30 days.

title.last90dRevenue.message: Transaction Amount in the Last Quarter
title.last90dRevenue.description: Transaction amount in the last 90 days.

title.revenueTrend.description: Title of the revenue trend line chart.

title.manageOrderDiscount.description: Title of the order discount management page.

title.discountLookup.description: Title of the section displaying the user's current discounts.

title.createDiscount.description: Title of the section for creating a new discount.

title.updateDiscount.description: Title of the popup for editing a discount.
